titleStmt.title: All gentlemen and others, may be pleased to take notice, that there is a stranger come into these parts, whose name is Peter Francesse that hath brought with him out of the kingdome of Persia, perfect remedy for the gout, the sciatica, the running gout, and all aches in the limbs, ...
titleStmt.author: Francesse, Peter.

titleStmt.title: All gentlemen and others, may be pleased to take notice, that there is a stranger come into these parts, whose name is Peter Francesse that hath brought with him out of the kingdome of Persia, perfect remedy for the gout, the sciatica, the running gout, and all aches in the limbs, ...
titleStmt.author: Francesse, Peter.

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
An advertisement of a cure for gout and sciatica offered by Peter Francesse.--Thomason catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
